title: Planning
description: Development Process Planning: find out the scope of the problem and determine solutions

title: Systems Analysis and Requirements
description: consider the functional requirements of the project or solution,analyzing the needs of the end users to ensure the new system can meet their expectations

title: Systems Design
description: end users to discuss and determine their specific business information needs for the proposed system,consider the essential components (hardware and/or software) structure (networking capabilities), processing and procedures for the system to accomplish its objectives.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Testing ,Repeatation, specifically to check for errors, bugs and interoperability

title: Implementation
description: actual installation of the newly-developed system, putting the project into production by moving the data and components from the old system and placing them in the new system via a direct cutover

title: Operations and Maintenance
description: boost performance, add new capabilities or meet additional user requirements if there
